result.name: salmon-production-model
result.notes:
The bio-economic model can be used to identify and summarise potential 
production scenarios for Atlantic Salmon. 

Users can specify an initial fish weight, time of year and desired harvest 
weight; the model would then return the Time to Harvest for this scenario. 
Furthermore the model can optimise the time spent in an intermediate system 
such that the time in net pens is reduced below (eg) 12 months.
